EmailTemplate.name: Missing Flyer Canned Response
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI. I have reviewed your documents and they look great. We are just missing the copy of your flyer advertising your event. You can reply to this email with a flyer, copy of a raffle ticket, or a screen shot of a website advertising your event.
I look forward to working with you!
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
